Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: itemsMatching(conditions:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Loads items matching the given conditions [see NSPredicate+extensions] into the context.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: load(items:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Loads an array of items into the context.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: init(modelName:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Create a stack with the given model name, with a store type of NSSQLiteStoreType.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: init(modelName:storeType:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Create a stack with the given model name and store type.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: shutdown()
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Shuts down the stack safely, waiting for all operations to complete. The stack is not usable

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: save(_:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: A safe version of the save() method; throws when called on the viewContext.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: perform(_:completion:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Submits a block to a background context. The block receives the context and an inout boolean

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: query(_:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Submits a block to a background context. The block receives the context, which may be used

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.name: viewQuery(_:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:13CoreData.abstract: Submits a block to the viewContext. The block receives the context, which may be used

Classes/CoreDataStack.html.name: CoreDataStack
Classes/CoreDataStack.html.abstract: CoreDataStack is a safe, simple, and easy-to-use Core Data stack. The focus is on making safe
